title: Fukuzatsu! △△ Kankei
description:
From Fujoshi Bitches :
“I’ll make you feel good just like the other day so make that sexy face again for me”

Kanata, who’s crazy over cute girls and Sakaki, a cool good-looking guy but foulmouthed, are just like They become stepbrothers because of their parents’ remarriage!
Kanata absolutely objects to this marriage saying “I don’t want to become brothers with the guy I hate!” but then he realizes Sakaki’s unrequited love for him―?

Full of sweet and erotic love❤extras are also included!
